name: Fox Flares
description:
You are a fox that is spontaneously combusting. Try to find some water to alleviate the pains of this life. A platformer with some timing elements. 

 Go into the water pit to put out your fire. The timer will stop as well.

Controls
  • [Arrow Keys] to Move
    • Full screen so arrow keys don't scroll down, but WASD/SPACE or Xbox controller works too.
  • (Debug) [Q] to Return To Title
  • (Debug) [R] to Start From Last Checkpoint
  • (Debug) [ [ ] ] to Skip
